name: Virtual school life simulator
description:
Join first 3d school classroom as a new preschool kid, and learn numerous activities! Don’t get late for your first ever school class! So, find your quiz class from school information board. Prepare yourself for class first quiz by answering fruits name, vegetables, animals, body parts and bird’s name. Learn and get good grades to pass your school test. Relearn from your quiz mistakes and go for recess to play with football and freeze tag in preschool play area. Have your mom’s delicious lunch in your recess period to fulfil your appetite. Learn farm animals, play with letters, vegetables learning and animal book in a more fun way to boost up kids brain IQ at home.
After playing your favorite games, come back again to information board to find your next puzzle class! Solve puzzles, brain teasers and jigsaw pieces to have fun in this preschool simulator. Learn to join super hero puzzles to make your memory and learning abilities better. This preschool educational game is full of fun learning app for kids.
If you’re looking for kindergarten educational app, then you are at right place to make your learning more fun and enjoyable!
Features
• Multiple kindergarten learning activities
• Simple & intuitive child friendly learning games
• Quiz and Puzzle theme with various jigsaw puzzle pieces of super hero to play
• Help your kids in learning fruits, vegetables, body parts name and much more
• Attractive & colorful animation
Download this game and give us your reviews, so we can make more new preschool educational games for you.
